title: Eggshell incorporated agro-waste adsorbent pellets for sustainable orthophosphate capture from aqueous media
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SU00415E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bernd G. K. Steiger, Nam T. Bui, Bolanle M. Babalola, Lee D. Wilson
In this study, granular adsorbents containing varying ratios of torrefied wheat straw (TWS), eggshells (ES), and chitosan (Chi) were prepared, which are referred to as ternary wheat straw composites (TWCs).
